questions.question: Which of the following is the basic principle of fluid mechanics?

options.D: Study of fluid behaviour at rest or in motion

questions.question: What is fluid mechanics used for?

options.A: Fluid mechanics enables to comprehend the behaviour of solid fluids under pressure
options.B: Fluid mechanics enables to comprehend the behaviour of fluids under a variety of forces and atmospheric conditions
options.C: Fluid mechanics enables to comprehend the behaviour of fluids under various temperatures only
